entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Point Lepreau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:29 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Point Lepreau 11:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: 3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: NNW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Rain beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain or freezing rain changing to freezing rain with rain in the morning then to ice pellets in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to snow and ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
